list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large farming implement with one or more blades fixed in a frame, drawn by a tractor or by animals and used for cutting furrows in the soil and turning it over, especially to prepare for the planting of seeds.
a yoga pose assumed by lying on one's back and swinging one's legs over one's head until the outstretched feet approach or touch the floor.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: positions like plow and headstand can strain the neck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các vị trí như cày và đầu có có thể làm căng cổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: turn up the earth of (an area of land) with a plow, especially before sowing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bác Vic cày ruộng của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of a vehicle) move in a fast and uncontrolled manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car plowed into the side of a van
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe cày vào một bên của một chiếc xe tải
